layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x275
  LayoutBlockFlow {html} at (0,0) size 800x275
    LayoutBlockFlow {body} at (8,16) size 784x251
      LayoutBlockFlow {p} at (0,0) size 784x20
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 127x19
          text run at (0,0) width 127: "TD VALIGN=TOP"
      LayoutTable {table} at (0,36) size 657x215 [border: (1px outset #808080)]
        LayoutTableSection (anonymous) at (1,1) size 655x213
          LayoutTableRow {tr} at (0,2) size 655x209
            LayoutTableCell {td} at (2,2) size 204x209 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutImage {img} at (2,2) size 200x200
            LayoutTableCell {td} at (208,2) size 445x24 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=1 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutText {#text} at (2,2) size 441x19
                text run at (2,2) width 300: "The top of this text should be vertically aligned "
                text run at (302,2) width 141: "to the top of the image"
